Blog.post: MaTtHew is a loser sia... he can say i lyk norin i cannot say he lyk wei ting... LOSER.... haha now every1 noe u lyk her... n u hor... i guai lan wif other ppl u help mi... den i say u n wei ting onli u tell ppl i guai lan... LOSER.... still call ppl beat mi... pao dor mi no zuo wen... u is lyk damn fake lor.... LOSER.... n i tink i dun want to eat wif dem liao lor... He is lyk damn fuked up... i happy he say i always joke lyk matthew.... i not happy he say i sadist... wtf man... i not happy rdy la... today haf tuition.. so sian... fucking hell... li wen bo tai bo zi gan mi... she siao 1.... ownself pek chek den come n find ppl scold.... f*** off man.... bye

Today recess dat time norin shake my hand... woah her hand so soft... ahh... woah at dat time my heart dunnoe go until where... haha...i was stunned... i think is a dare... chanatip dey all dare norin to hold my hand... but in the end jus shake onli... :( nvm la is good liao la... haha.. today so happy... now chatting wif her... 05.31pm... later haf tuition again... hais! chinese tuition... :D so sad...den later mus study science... nothing else liao... 再见

Today got fed up wif 'dem'.. pang seh dem also not happy follow dem oso not happy... hais... dey never even tell mi why dey wan kenneth to faint den i call dem oso got wrong... ownself say all the funny story dey haf dun tell mi.. den how i noe??? dey siao 1... hais... come back home haf tuition... haha.. the teacher siao 1 call mi write compe "a joyful reunion" den he call mi add 24 black horses into the freaking compo... how the heck i relate 24 black horses into a joyful reunion.. haha... today my mother bdae we go n eat korean food... den after cut cake... den no more liao lor.... study maths abit.. i tink today i sleep early i so tired.. haha... bye

I Hate : food is: loh mee drink is: root beer movie is: Lilo & Stitch show is: Chinese Drama place is: School brand is: Siemens(Phone), Reebok(Sports) colour is: Green singer is: Micheal Jackson song is: Yellow Submarine(4eva!) band is: The White Stripes idol is: Saddam Hussein

Today go school usual time... normal school day until after school... my ting xie fail den only get until 0/100.. hahaha... must stay back do correction... den actually supposed to meet hao yee but den he last minute haf stay back so dunneed to meet liao lor... so i call my lau bei come fetch mi den sit at the bus stop there n wait 4 lyk 20minutes... den saw kenneth, matthew, leonard n colin walking kana called pang seh kia.. hais.. nvm la i'm used to it hahahahhha.... den lunch i go eat mcdonald.. McSpicy Double w/o Vegetable haha... den i stay at home whole day play computer until 6 sumthing my father come back den mus act do homework... soon after my mother com back den we eat... 8+ dat time we burn the incense paper all these pray 7th month... den now i typing tis lor... hahaha... tonight i dowan sleep until 12 den i go n wake my mother up wish her happy bdae... hahaha :) ciao

Today wake up my parents come back from the market liao... so dunneed to go.. ok la.. quit elate.. wake up at 10... haha... den later we eating halfway my father fren come... so sian the to boy primary 3 call me teach dem how to play simi battleon.com i also dunnoe how to play.. in fact i never heard of the freaking website b4.. haha... den later dey go dat time i lie at the sofa watch tv until 12 sumthin' go n bathe prepare for my guitar course(yamaha thing)... hais... 2pm my guitar course... after dat we go n buy bdae cake 4 my mother... but she dunnoe la... den she cannot find mi.. haha... den we go n eat waton mee 4 lunch... den my mother go n make her eye lashes longer den i go home play computer... half hr later we go n fetch her... den go buy 4d den we jio all the relative go eat dinner... den we suddenly bring out the cake she was suprised(wow :|)... eating halfway we go n see fireworks.. the national day shit... den we fetch the relative go home den come home den now i writing this shit lor.. hahah ciao ciao byebye...

Today, very late wake up... 10.30am... so sian. nothing to do.. den i go n play computer lor.. play play play whole day... den my father comeback... we mus go n eat dinner... go n jio 1 aunty go eat she dowan... den we go n fetch my another aunty n my cousin go n eat lor... damn sian... eat kuay chap... haha... den after we go back home... 1hr later go n fetch my mother frm airport lor.. den now jus reach home.. nothing to do.. haha i tink i go n sleep... my mother birthday coming... coming tuesday.. dunnoe wad to get her.. haha... will think of something la.. :D i tink i play game awhile more i go n sleep la.. kk nothing else to write liao! bye... ciao

Time To Burn by Rasmus, The Fear of the dark tears me apart won´t leave me alone and time keeps running out Just one more life, I'm so sick and tired of singing the blues, I should turn my life around Tell me why do I feel this way all my life I`ve been standing on the borderline too many bridges burned too many lies I´ve heard I had life but I can´t go back I can´t do that, it will never be the same again and I know I don´t have any time burn they follow me home, disturbing my sleep but I´ll find a place, place where they cannot find me maybe I´m lost, and maybe I´m scared but too many times I´ve closed the doors behind me Tell me why do I feel this way all my life I`ve been standing on the borderline too many bridges burned too many lies I´ve heard I had life but I can´t go back I can´t do that, it will never be the same again and I know I don´t have any time burn leave it all behind cross the borderline face the truth, don´t have any time to... don´t have any time to burn Tell me why do I feel this way all my life I`ve been standing on the borderline too many bridges burned too many lies I´ve heard I had life but I can´t go back I can´t do that, it will never be the same again and I know I don´t have any time burn

Today reach school abit early... recess time bing song sit behind mi... den he kick mi from behind... den i slap him... hahaha den after dat jian bin kick mi from behind... i tot is bing song den i slap him... den he slam the spoon on the table... 2 seconds later he slam the whold plate of rice on the table.. my whole shirt kana the freaking sauce... :( but partly my fault... haha... den i call jia xing buy new shirt 4 mi... but he also quite good la.. i everytime say he n pearlyn he oso never angry... then colin also never pang seh... but only is jia xing n colin never pang seh mi... the rest r all pang seh kias... den today after school mr.wong stay us back 4 until 1pm liedat den i pissed off jus hand in the work n go off... but den i go n apologise to bing song... its good la... cuz he also apologised 2 mi... now 2 something... later got tuition AGAIN!!! at 5+ i going liaos.. den after dat i take taxi home la... i dunnoe whether tomorrow i going sentosa 4 the freaking thing(NCC) anot cuz mr.wong let us go off late den i go n find brandon dat time no one there liao... so i dunnoe la... nothing else liao... ya 1 more thing.. chanatip bluff mi.. she is a liar... byebye ciao ciao

Today morning mus wake up early cus my dad fetch mi to school 1st den fetch my mother go airport... she going thailand for golf la... sian... Den today got Lit exam damn bloody hard i dunnoe how to do it... Surely fail one... den later after recess wanna sit wif kenneth i wanna fake teacher i never bring textbook so can sit mah... den dat yao rong go n pao doh mi... hes a bastard... ya den today got NCC IMT rifle training 12 oclock can leave the class liao... n just nice is chinese(luo bao bei; luo han yu; zhu mimi; elephant)... hahahah she haf alot of damn nicknames... go there.. ppl tell mi 5+ 6+ den reach bak school, i 4.50 reach back school liao.... go there got: fail :( pass :| marksman :D... so i kana pass onli :|.... den today bradon ask mi a silly question... hahaha damn funny.... in the bus brandon keep trying tosay jokes den my fren keep saying him back... eh, brandon is my enjeh(if dats how u spell it) hor! who bully him who dies... den i today exception take taxi home... the taxi driver keep telling mi about NS life, n NCC life... but i mus also thank him la... he help mi learn more about things lor... Den today still haf tuition damn sian... Teacher haolian about he sec 3 dat time compo win university student... hao lian... buay hel bai... later 11pm i mus remember to watch The OC... hahaha... dats all!! ciaociao byebye

Today Mr.Wong siao one he go and crush the OHP because leonard talking to Jasper. Then he suddenly got emotional breakdown cannot control his f***ing temper den the glass break. Like dat need to pay 4 the OPH worth it meh?? Actually Mr.Wong quite a nice teacher la, he wanna help us but we dowan to learn so too bad 4 him. Den after school he never come and gif us remedial i think because his hand pain. Den today Ms.Poon the tweety bird faced b**** gif us compo. I siao 1 i go n call her to shut up when she giving instructions. Den she take f***ing parang toh tio mi but lucky she changed her f***ing mind. HaHahA, i laughing at my own jokes. Aiya, y national day holiday so f***ing short. i was jus beginning to enjoy. Then this f***ing afternoon we eat slut food!! From the f***ing slut la. Wanna see her picture?? click here: urlLink (",) Then later take 147(as usual) wif matthew n colin(as usual) den kenneth pang seh us la(everytime lieddat 1). Sian later haf tuition n f***ing exams tomorrow literature i never learn yet. Aiya today mus stay up late liao lo.. HaHa, kk nothing else liao.. ByeBye!! 再见!!
